summary: Samson was a powerful judge and leader of the ancient Israelites. God gave him super strength to fight his enemies. He could do amazing things, like killing a lion with his bare hands. His long hair was a sign of his strength, but his lover Delilah tricked him, cutting his hair and betraying him to the Philistines. They captured him and made him work hard. In the end, Samson used his strength one last time to destroy a temple, killing himself and his enemies. His story is important in Jewish, Christian, and Islamic traditions.
title: Samson
